attributes.action: Release all documents pertaining to the Hillsborough Disaster in 1989
attributes.additional_details:
Recently, the Cabinet Office had decided to appeal against a decision to Thatcher release documents relating to the Hillsborough Disaster and those 96 who went to a football game and never returned. This petition was created to spread the word to the government that we will not put up with anymore delaying in seeking justice for those 96 souls and their families.

Release all the information, including the Tthatcher files, so the truth can come out 22 years too late.
